body:
Comment 2 by **tarmigan**: 
Thanks Alex,

You are correct.  I had GOROOT=C:\gowin-env\\go  which was set in go-env.bat by 
set GOROOT=%_base%\go

Change GOROOT to either c:\\gowin-env\\go or c:/gowin-env/go fixes the problem for me.

So it looks to me like this is not a problem with go or cgo, but with go-env.bat

Changing line 3 to
set GOROOT=%_base:\=/%go
fixes the issue for me.

Thanks,
Tarmigan
